answers.answer: Hi, relax, all is fine but do get your test repeated after 2 months. What about urine report? Your blood report suggests no kidney issues.

urine report saysspecific gravity- 1.20--range 1.001-1.035ph- 6.0-range 5.0-8.0color amber (supposed to be yellow??)all else is negative or none seentotal cholesterol 173triglycerides -21- raqnge 5-40ldl-99hdl-53If you need anything else let me know, Thanx for the reply!!
Maybe I have diabetes then from these wisdom teeth that are rotten, I never went back to dentist to pull em out??

question: Iwas a heavy beer drinker for several years and finaly decided to quit. I went to the doctor to get blood and urine work done. Everything was good except for the followingglucose 102---range65 - 99 mg/dlcalcium serum 10.4---range 8.6 - 10.2 mg/dltotal protein 8.2---range6.2 - 8.3 g/dlalbumin5.2----range 3.6 - 5.1g/dlI dont know what this means? Do I have a kidney problem? please help? Thanx Steve
title: high glucose, calcium serum, and albumin
